text: Giovanni Giuseppe Goria (30 July 1943 â€“ 21 May 1994) was an Italian politician. He was the 46th Prime Minister of Italy from 1987 to 1988. Goria died suddenly from lung cancer in his hometown Asti, aged 50. == References == Category:1943 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Italy Category:Politicians from Piedmont Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Disease-related deaths in Italy
title: Giovanni Goria
